page.title: 01SUMMARY
page.content: We live in an area including the towns and villages of St. Blazey, Par, Carlyon Bay and Tregrehan. This area has much to do with China Clay and contains many clay processing plants. The Cornish Leisure world is a very popular attraction, both for tourists and residents alike, and many famous and not so famous stars have appeared there. During the Summer there are many tourists in the area, staying in the many hotels, guest houses, and camping and caravan sites, particularly those at Carlyon Bay. The majority of people enjoy living in the area, and many tourists return again and again to sample the many delights and excellent facilities of this area.
